name: Town
consumeScript: a = consume(res.vegFood, res.inhabitants * 0.8); a = a * 0.5; b = consume(res.meatFood, res.inhabitants * 0.2);b = b * 0.5; res.consumeSatisfaction = a + b;
produceScript: tax = res.inhabitants * 1; glob.gold = glob.gold  + tax; a = res.consumeSatisfaction - 0.3; a = a * 0.2; inhabitantsInc = res.inhabitants * a; produce(res.inhabitants, inhabitantsInc); produce(res.workToken, res.inhabitants);
